        public boolean isReadyForPurge(int purgeDuration)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • purge

        public void purge(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  boolean async)
        Deletes the shop's data, deletes the base-block, drops the stock, destroys the display packet, and unregisters the object.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to drop items to.
        async - Whether the file deletion is async or not.
